attributes.action: Ban the heinous act of playing Coldplay songs
attributes.additional_details:
Coldplay are hurtful. They are hurtful to the fabric of Western society, with their rubbish lyrics and Chris Martin's whiny voice. Many ears are left bleeding after listening to their garbage.

I invite the government of the United Kingdom to remove Coldplay from our media, airwaves and screens. Thereby freeing up space for decent tunes and saving mass ear bleedage.
